title: What are some stunning bold photos of Sara Ali Khan in 2020? - Quora

response.answer_text: One of her latest shoot for Filmfare Magazine, she is stunning in her own ways, she simple yet elegant, beauty with the responsibility(i must say). The granddaughter of the late cricketer Mansoor Ali Khan Pataudi and actor Sharmila Tagore, Sara grew up to be a plump teenager, but the change in her physicality and demeanour is miraculous. From a chubby teenager, she now flaunts an enviable silhouette. From 96 kilos to her current svelte avatar, it has been a journey of unwavering commitment. Someone who was averse to exercise is now a gym fanatic. Sara Ali Khan has a massive fan base and keeps updating her fans with her professional and personal upgrades. You can stalk😂 sorry i mean you can follow her at her instagram for latest pics and shoots she been involved in. By the way i too stalks her🤣 Here's the link : Sara Ali Khan (@saraalikhan95) • Instagram photos and videos Regards Rahul
